markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wand of Reaching](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2287)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 141 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This long, slender wand is constructed of silver, polished to a mirror shine.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell; This activation takes <actions string="Two Actions" /> if the spell normally takes <actions string="Single Action" /> to cast, or <actions string="Three Actions" /> if the spell normally takes <actions string="Two Actions" />;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You Cast the Spell. Its range increases by 30 feet. As normal for increasing ranges, if the spell normally has a range of touch, its range extends to 30 feet.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of a spell of the appropriate rank. The spell must have a casting time of <actions string="Single Action" /> or <actions string="Two Actions" />, and must have a range.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
